message:
I remember when I started socket programming, the official Microsoft API documentation was only available in a Word document, which was weird. Beej had an excellent guide that got me through it even if it was geared towards Linux:  
[http://beej.us/guide/bgnet/output/html/singlepage/bgnet.html](http://beej.us/guide/bgnet/output/html/singlepage/bgnet.html)
